title: DreamCatcher AI
description: An app that records and analyzes your dreams using voice input and machine learning.

title: PlantPal
description: A smart assistant that reminds you when and how to water your plants, based on their type and environment.

title: Teleport Eats
description: Futuristic concept: food instantly 'printed' from your phone after selecting a recipe.

title: MuseMate
description: AI writing partner that generates story twists, character arcs, or poem lines on demand.

title: WanderWhere
description: Spin-the-globe-style travel app that suggests random yet budget-friendly destinations.
